name: pytools
raw_recipe:
{% set version = "2016.2.1" %}

package:
    name: pytools
    version: {{ version }}

source:
    fn: pytools-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/p/pytools/pytools-{{ version }}.tar.gz
    md5: 452dfa3023733a675cc1bee91c536cbd
    patches:
        - encoding.patch  # [win and py3k]

build:
    number: 0
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - setuptools
    run:
        - python
        - numpy
        - decorator >=3.2.0
        - appdirs >=1.4.0
        - six

test:
    imports:
        - pytools

about:
    home: http://pypi.python.org/pypi/pytools
    license: MIT
    summary: A collection of tools for Python

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - ocefpaf
